Desc.entry: Activities available: canoeing, kayaking, sailing, windsurfing and a climbing wall. There is also a caravanning and camping site, along with a childrens' playground. Licensed under the Adventure Activities Licensing Regulations to teach under 18s. Children aged 8 years and under must be accompanied by an adult. British Canoe Union approved centre. Affiliated to the Royal Yachting Association. Accommodation block for 40 people. All activities are only available through bookings, either party, day visits, residential visits or taster sessions. General use of the lake is currently unavailable. Holds the Sheffield and District Vintage Motorcycle Rally and the British University Student Association Canoe Polo Championships and a triathlon in July.
